Hello everyone, I think this is my first post, but I thought you guys  would be intrested in this. On animesuki.com they have an anime based  on Hijikata, I haven't seen it yet, but I guess it was made in 2004.
  
  Here is the torrent:
  http://www.thejollyroger.org/tracker/torrents/%5BJR%5D_Hijikata_Toshizo_-_Shiro_no_Kiseki_OVA_%5BA22B0BBC%5D.avi.torrent
